review: Taken omeprazole for 5 year due to not being able to keep food down and damage to my oesophagus from acid reflux.Taken off that because started with a side effect.Taken famotidine for 4 weeks and in that time I have become more miserable, depressed, aching all over and suicidal thoughts.I hit rock bottom using these tablets and ended up self harming.I have stopped taking them, it's been 3 days and I already feel in a better place that I have from day one taking famotidine.STAY AWAY FROM THESE USELESS TABLETS.They didn't even stop the reflux either.
Pepcid 20mg twice daily. Slight chest pain and tightening. Feeling heavy and slight headache but not with every dose. It does stop all my stomach and chest issues after an hour or so.

Twenty-four hours after beginning 40mg famotidine daily doses, woke up with stabbing, burning pain in my shoulder joints and tendons, along with lower back stabbing pain and pain in the tendons of my hip joints.  Stopped medication after six days.  Pain did not cease.  Three weeks later, I am now under another doctor's care for the debilitating pain brought on by this medication.

Very bad experience with this drug famotidine. Almost instantly, I started having side effects very severe headaches, dizziness, and nausea. I also had very bad cramps that lead to diarrhea. Only minimally helps with GERD and acid reflux related diseases
